name: Soup.io Friend's Stream Cleaned
description: Makes Soup.io's friend's stream much cleaner and good looking.
additional_info:
Version 1.1.1 (12.05.2013)

* Sites: Friends of my friends, My followers and Everyone are now affected by this style.
* Repost buttons and dropdown lists has been slightly rounded.
* Few minor improvements.

Version 1.1 (03.05.2013)

* Mainly positioning improvements. Now it should look well regardless of desktop resolution and size of browser window.
